text: rtelorism - Hypertriglyceridemia - Hypoglycemia - Intellectual disability - Ketoacidosis - Lethargy - Low-set ears - Metabolic acidosis - Muscular dystrophy - Osteoporosis - Pathologic fracture - Small for gestational age - Strabismus - X-linked dominant inheritance - X-linked recessive inheritance - The Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO) has collected information on how often a sign or symptom occurs in a condition.
